data.prayer: Jesus, remind the disciples in the county of Faisalabad to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Faisalabad, Punjab, Pakistan
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, you have chosen the weak things of this world to confound the strong. Make the poor and outcast in the county of Faisalabad a testimony of your strength.
data.verse: God chose the foolish things of the world that he might put to shame those who are wise. God chose the weak things of the world, that he might put to shame the things that are strong;

data.prayer: Spirit, inspire new kinds of evangelism through social media in Faisalabad, Punjab, Pakistan.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist, discharge all the duties of your ministry.

data.prayer: Father, we pray for every movement leader and disciple in the county of Faisalabad, Punjab, Pakistan that they would have deepening intimacy with you.
data.verse: On that day you will realize that I am in my Father, and you are in me, and I am in you.

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Pinjara people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Father, please send teachers of your Word in Faisalabad who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.
Father, it’s possible most of the 3,163,026 lost people in  Faisalabad, Punjab, Pakistan have never held or opened a Bible. Please change this, Father.
data.verse: Yet faith comes from listening to this Good News—the Good News about Christ.

data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Faisalabad, Punjab, Pakistan a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the county.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up
